snippet: A red Ford Expedition mounted the sidewalk in Brooklyn on Saturday not once, but twice, crashing into two other vehicles before plowing into pedestrians on the opposite curb.
abstract: Anthony Byrd of Brooklyn is charged with criminally negligent homicide and reckless driving after his Ford Expedition mounted sidewalk in Fort Greene, crashing into vehicles and pedestrians and killing 9-year-old Lucian Merryweather.
lead_paragraph: A red Ford Expedition mounted the sidewalk in Brooklyn on Saturday not once, but twice, crashing into two other vehicles before plowing into pedestrians on the opposite curb.

headline.main: Driver Charged With Negligent Homicide in Death of Boy, 9
headline.print_headline: Driver Charged With Negligent Homicide in Death of Boy, 9
